Datafiler Readme v0.4
(2009-3-25)
Tang Gang 
tangg@lemote.com
=============================================================================

This tools is to analyze the mounts of data generated by another tool
'sysrec'. There are two ways to process those data file -- single file or
batch files mode.

The default input directory is '../record_result', defualt output directory
is '../formatted_result'.

By default, the parameters of 'run_one' should be the input file's name and
output file's name. If parameter 1 is omitted, it will choose the default
file name 'top_result.txt' in the directory of 'record_result'. If parameter
2 is omitted, it will choose the default file name 'output_file.txt'.

By default, the parameters of 'run_batch' should be the input directory's
name and output direcotry's name. If parameter 1 is omitted, it will choose
the default directory name '../record_result'. If parameter 2 is omitted, it
will choose the default directory name '../formatted_result'.


usage:

Single file:
./run_one [input_filename.txt] [output_filename.txt]

Batch file:
./run_batch [input_dir] [output_dir]
